messages.message:
`yapf: toml package is needed for using pyproject.toml as a configuration file`

has anyone faced this during a git commit?
This happened after I pulled the latest changes from master and merged with my local branch

- repo: https://github.com/pre-commit/mirrors-yapf
    rev: v0.30.0

reverting this version to the one on my branch worked for me but not sure if it's the right way
